channel.title: Tau Cannon Effect Misaligned
channel.description:
It seems the charge glow effect on the new Tau Cannon model is misaligned.
[img='https://i.imgur.com/W4Yyd5x.jpg',left][/img] Here you can see the glow effect isn't aligned with the tip of the gun.
[img='https://i.imgur.com/Hra9wCN.jpg',left][/img]It's harder to see, but on the original model, it [i]is [/i]aligned with the tip of the gun.

item.title: Tau Cannon Effect Misaligned
item.dc:creator: gooball60
item.description:
It seems the charge glow effect on the new Tau Cannon model is misaligned.


Here you can see the glow effect isn’t aligned with the tip of the gun.

It’s harder to see, but on the original model, it is aligned with the tip of the gun.

Read full topic
